name: Helianthus (farewellnorth)
description:
Helianthus is a silly little game about an astronaut vacationing on an abandoned planet. With an incoming asteroid strike, it's up to you to grow a massive sunflower by collecting water and sunlight in order to climb back to the safety of your ship. Oh, and don't forget to dodge those asteroids!

Helianthus was created in eight days for the Farewell North community Game Jam. Come join the Discord to chat with the community, play the games, and participate in future jams. 

Controls:

- WASD / Left Joystick to move

- Hold E / Right Trigger to collect water
